subject: thank you notes (anonymous)
body:
i am thankful for a warm and safe place to sleep.

i am thankful for the support of friends, family and community.

i am thankful for all the brave people making noise about the fucked up ways that we live together as a species. 

i am thankful for the internet.

\- anonymous (1/28/16).
normalized_markdown:

\- anonymous (1/28/16).
